summary: This module implements an API handler that routes requests for Vertex AI Model Garden models, identified by a specific model string pattern, to an OpenAI-compatible chat completion function. It builds the appropriate Vertex AI endpoint URL and provides a wrapper class to generate text completions using these models.
business_intent: Allow developers to seamlessly access Vertex AI Model Garden models through the litellm library, treating them like OpenAI models to simplify integration, reduce custom code, and handle request construction and error management.
